params.prompt: The video features a woman in a well-lit bathroom, standing and gesturing animatedly with her hands. She is wearing a black lace-trimmed light pink camisole, her hair neatly pulled back, and her makeup finely detailed with prominent eye makeup. She begins by touching her forehead with both hands, then gestures with her hands while speaking, moving them up and down and side to side. She brings her hands to her cheeks, possibly while explaining a step in a skincare routine. The background consists of neutral-colored walls and a glass shower enclosure, creating a clean and modern ambiance.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
